column1: The  Petitioners  filed  this  application  on  2nd  April  2013  claiming  that  they  are
entitled to be  promoted to the rank of Sub  Inspector of Police,  as  each  of them
have  obtained 47  marks and  above at the interview, which  is  the 'cut off' mark
for promotion,  In  tbe-caSâ‚¬-Of  Women  Police  Sergeants,  this  mark was  59,  Tbis
